org.dthume.couchdb.maven
Class AbstractCouchMojo

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      org.dthume.couchdb.maven.AbstractCouchMojo
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractOnlineCouchMojo, AttachArtifactsMojo, CompileJSMojo, CompressArtifactsMojo, ExpandIncludesMojo, PackageMojo
public abstract class AbstractCouchMojo
extends org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo

Base class for couch mojos; defines the base set of configuration properties.

Author:
dth
